form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Form I-693, Application for a Naturalization and/or Adjustment of Status; NARA Form 1074, NARA Form 1077

full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/25/2023 (c) (have you ever been confined in a military prison OF jail?) (d) (Have you ever been engaged in illicit buying, selling or handling of narcotic drugs?) (e) (Have you ever been the benefici- ary of a amnesty, rehabilitation decree, other act of clemency or similar action? (If so, explain)) (2) (a) (Have you ever been placed in an almshouse (poorhouse or charitable institution)?) (b) (Are you a pauper, professional beggar or vagrant?) (c) (Are you now afflicted with a physical defect, disease or disability which may affect your ability to earn a living?) (d) (Will you be able to support yourself financially in the United States?) H (3) (a) (Have you ever had one or more attacks of insanity?) (b) ? (Are you now or have you ever been afflicted with psychopathic personality, epilepsy, mental defect, fits, fainting spells, con- vulsions or a nervous breakdown?) (c) (Are you now or have you ever been a narcotic or drug addict or chronic alcoholic?) (d) (Have you ever been treated in a hospital, institution or elsewhere for insanity or other mental & disorder or for drug or narcotic addiction or alcoholism?) (e) (Have you ever had tuberculosis, leprosy, or any other dangerous contagious disease?) (4) (a) (Are you a polygamist, do you practice polygamy, or do you advocate the practice of polygamy?) (b) (Are you or have you ever been prostitute, procurer, or supported wholly or in part from the proceeds of prostitution?) (c) (Are you going to United States to engage in an immoral sexual act, in prostitution, or other unlawful commercialized vice?) (5) (a) (Have you previously applied for a visa to enter the United States either as an im- migrant or as a nonimmigrant? (If answer is "yes," state where and when, whether you applied for a non- immigrant or an immigrant visa and whether the visa was issued)) (b) (Have you been refused admission to the United States during the last twelve months? (If the answer is "Yes" submit evidence that the Attorney General has consented to your reapplying for admission into the United States.)) (c) (Have you ever been) (A) (arrested and deported from the United States?) (B) (voluntarily removed from the United States at United States government expense as a person who fell into distress?) (C) (removed from the United States as an alien enemy?) (D) (removed from the United States at Government expense in lieu of deportation?) in) (If the answer to any of the above questions is "Yes" submit evidence that the Attorney General has consented to your reapplying for admission into the United States.) (6) (a) (Have you ever attempted to obtain di by fraud or willful misrepresentation a visa or other documentation to enter the United States?) (b) (Have you ever obtained by fraud TO or willful misrepresentation a visa or other documentation to enter the United States?) (7) (a) (Are you now or have you ever been ineligible for United States citizenship?) (b) (Have you ever departed from or remained outside of the United States to avoid or evade military service in time of war or national emergency?) (c) (Have you ever registered with a draft board under the selective service laws of the United States?) (8) (Can you, if you are over sixteen, read and understand some language or dialect?) (9) (Have you for gain ever assisted another alien to H enter the United-States or try to enter the United States in violation of the laws of the United States?)
